Class CompanyDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbdao.CompanyDBDAO

    CompanyDAO

    public class CompanyDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO
    The class CompanyDBDAO is part of myCouponProject the class CompanyDBDAO communicates between the CompanyFacade and SQL
